BIO

Hi I'm Sergio Ruy, Java Backend Developer, I like and get along with Java, but I really enjoy ventoring into a full stack applications. I'm just a geek guy really curious and always hungry to learn new things. If you want see some of my projects you can go ahead to "My Work" menu, there you can see some web apps. I build this apps using Spring Framework and Angular in the frontend. Check below some of my skills.

Database

Mysql, JPA, JDBC

I have some experience with Mysql database, Hibernate, Migrations with FlywayDB, consult, create tables and etc... Recently I start study MongoDB database with Spring Webflux, but I still studying, I'm only confident with relational databases until now.

Spring Framework

APIs REST and MVC

Experience to build API REST and MVC web applications with Spring Framework. Using all resources like a Spring Data JPA, Spring Security, dependencies injection, exception handler and etc... Now I start study Spring Cloud and Microservices.

Angular

Single Page Application

I'm a backend developer, but as I said, I love building fullstack applications and for a front-end, I have some experience with Angular and Single Page Web Applications. Writing code with typescript, libraries like Bootstrap, PrimeNG and Angular Material.
